column6: Use this space to discuss the relative merits and demerits of each plan from your assigned perspective in step 3. Wherever possible, supplement plan suggestions, agreements and disagreements with reasons, and try to refer to or build upon your teammates' ideas. I will support you in the process.

column6: I agree with Plan 1. It's the least costly and we can reinvest earnings down the road.
Ditto.  Plan 1 is also the only plan that fits the city's tight budget, and like Bill said, there will be addtional money that can be invested for development down the road.
Hey Louie, which of the plans seems to be the best from your perspective of what would be the most economical ?
